_id.description: the unique identifier for the instructor object

term_id.description: the term id associated with the instructor

code.description: the instructors code; their username according to their university email (ex. 'foaad', 'amgrow')

last_name.description: the last name of the instructor

full_name.description: the full name of the instructor (last name, first name [optional middle name or initial.])

sections.description: an array of section ids the instructor teaches

job_title.description: the job title of the instructor

office.description: the room id of the instructor's office

url.description: the url to the instructor's page (useful for end users)
